title: Robot

fields.name: Jackpot Effects:
fields.value:
1. Lucky Shot: Make a player of your choice gain 5 **Card Shards**
2. Regenerate: Choose a card to discard.
3. One More Roll: Roll one more die (Without triggering the negative effects of exceeding 21)

desc:
Post 2000
- As you play this, gain a copy of (1999) Pea Shooter
- Each turn that this is in your ID zone, before you play a card, you may choose to roll as many dice as you please, as long as their total does not reach or exceed 21.
- If your total dice roll is exactly 21, you may choose one of the Jackpot Effects listed below. (Does not end your turn)
- If your total dice roll exceeds 21, you draw a card and skip this turn.
